tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Had a wonderful experience with the Doctor.She was really friendly and wasn't just filling in an appointment slot. Even before asking about the actual problem, she ensued that she knows about all other details about the child such as past problems, diet etc. Coming to the actual problem, she never was in a hurry to listen and prescribe. She listened to the problem and subsequent questions very patiently and answered all of them in detail. Whether the treatment works or not is secondary but the intent and content of the doctor matters and thats where she has been a wonderful person. In my experience with most doctors at Bangalore, they expect us to book another appointment in order to ask follow up questions. But Dr Tejaswini never had any such expectations. In fact when I booked another appointment after 4 days, she asked me why did I book another appointment. This was very kind and ethical of her and builds a trust that she will not prescribe any unnecessary treatments or tests etc.Coming to the actual treatment, Dr was really thorough and told me all stages of treatment. She didn't prescribe all tests etc for the first day itself and asked us to wait before getting tests and subsequent medications.Glad to have found her for my child.Thank you!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I am really happy with the treatment. Doctor will explain the issue very clearly and patiently repeats if we asked twice. Unnecessarily she will not go for antibiotics and all. I went for my baby (6 months old) who has very bad motions (diarrhoea), doctor has suggested diet plan to my baby and gave very mild medication and not rushed for antibiotics. Overall satisfied with the treatment and doctor. If you are looking for best Pediatrician for your baby, without doubt you can visit Dr. Tejaswini mam.

tags: None
review:
Although we just went for vaccination, doctor enquired about the kids daily routine and behavior, history of any illness, food phone habits etc.. Which was impressive. Any other centre would normally give the vaccine and move on to the next kid.
The way she talks may give the impression that she is in a hurry, but its just her way of talking. If visiting for the first time, please spend a few minutes more to adjust to her rate od speech or ask her again, she is really good and friendly!!, today was our 3rd visit.

tags: None
review:
most reliable doctor in Bangalore.
Instead of just listening and suggesting everything as okay, she has ********** ********** vast experience to differentiate patterns and Asks right questions,
Provides specific DOs and Donots 
Guides health child best

tags: Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I have had very unprofessional experience with Dr.Tejaswini. She doesn‚Äôt respect patient‚Äôs time and money both.
I had booked a video consultation on June 13th at 7.15pm. I was asked to wait until 8pm as she was busy. I waited but didn‚Äôt receive any call nor my calls were answered. Later at night ,over the message she confirmed she would connect the next day.
Even the next my calls were not answered and after multiple reminder I was again asked to wait until 8pm.
I waited again , even after then my calls were not answered.
First of all we book appointments respecting your schedule, we expect you to respect patients time and money both. It‚Äôs a prepaid appointment and we as a patient don‚Äôt deserve to do multiple follow ups and reminders to you , specially for the appointment that you have postponed for your personal reasons.
Really an unpleasant experience over this platform!

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,
review:
We visited the doctor for a bruise that was on our son‚Äôs forehead for sometime. The moment she saw our son, she diagnosed him to be hyperactive and even told us that she would observe him for a couple of months and then finalise the diagnosis.
As first time parents, parenting is already a scary and challenging journey. ** **** ** ****** ******* ***** *** **** **** ************* 
First of all, we had to wait in the clinic for about an hour which would make any toddler grow impatient and grumpy (despite having an appointment). 
I did a lot of research on the topic and even consulted another docto* *** ** ***** *** *** *********** ** ************* ** **** ** ***** * ******** ****** ******* ** ***** ************ ************* ** * ********* ******* *** *********

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I had a very poor experience with the doctor. Though the doctor appeared very friendly in the beginning, but after consultation, the follow up was very difficult. Even after several messaged to her, she didn't bother to respond.  Very rude on part of Doctor.  The patient always look up to their doctor for help, but she didn't care. Very bad experience.

tags: None
review: Doctor is really good but the appointment system is disgusting. There id no receptionist  to manage and even after taking the appointment one has to wait for minimum 2 hours. Kids become impatient and its really tough since not sufficient seats in waiting area.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: We were worried about our daughter complaining about severe stomach ache . Doctor interviewed my daughter in a very professional way and inspected her looking for all the vital stats  and inquiring us for the symptoms that we observed. Finally she concluded her diagnosis and answered our doubts and concerns  . Thankfully as of now my daughter is fine but as per her instructions we are observing her for few days.

tags: None

The waiting time is always a lot and never starts at the booked time. Sometimes we are asked to come early but still had to wait for around 30 min. Otherwise we are very contended with the consultations.

review: My main concern with the doctor is not with her medical abilities but that she has zero supporting infrastructure. There are no support staff to keep the place clean or to communicate wait times to the patients. It doesn't help that the clinic is located next to the dusty roads of Green Glen Layout.

tags: None

review: The call was made on time but she didn‚Äôt sent the prescription‚Ä¶she asked us to send the video of the baby‚Äôs eye infection and baby‚Äôs development but she didn‚Äôt reverted to us..after continuing follow up with her over WhatsApp and call (which she didn‚Äôt responded),she sent prescription late night around 7.30 pm and the consultation was done at 2ish.she suggested meds after giving that baby is now having fever cold cough which she was not experiencing earlier it was just inflammation on her left eye..when infomed to the doctor abt the same she didn‚Äôt responded again after repeated follow up and just said to continue the med later.my baby is 8 month old and she is suffering .I won‚Äôt recommend her.*** **** ** ****** ********* ******

My daughter loves her clinic, inspite of all the vaccination done there.
